programme.title: Desperation Road
programme.desc: In Mississippi, a mother and her child are caught in a crossfire as alcohol, guns and revenge clash. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Feb 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. At the funeral for an old friend, Claire approaches the deceased's widower and states that she intends to murder him in revenge for something terrible he did decades ago. Claire then reconnects with her estranged college pal, Evelyn, who agrees to help out - if only to see if Claire really follows through.. Paul Weitz - Director Jane Fonda - Claire Lily Tomlin - Evelyn Malcolm McDowell - Howard Richard Roundtree - Ralph Sarah Burns - Allie Catherine Dent - Molly.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Comedy starring Bradley Cooper, Zach Galifianakis and Ed Helms. Three friends wake up in a wrecked Vegas hotel room following a stag night for their friend Doug. programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Comedy starring Rowan Atkinson as the accident-prone Mr Bean. programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.sub-title: Romance, Drama, Music, Musical, Arts And Culture ║ 2018 ║ 15
programme.desc: Musical romantic drama starring Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper. Rock star Jackson Maine meets aspiring songwriter Ally, a waitress who moonlights as a bar singer. programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Musical, Drama, Music, Romance ║ 2008 ║ PG
programme.desc: Musical romantic comedy featuring the music of Abba, and starring Meryl Streep, Colin Firth and Pierce Brosnan. On an idyllic Greek island, young Sophie Sheridan prepares to marry the man of her dreams. But a problem looks set to blight the big day as the bride doesn't know who her father is. programme.title: Chicago
programme.sub-title: Musical, Drama, Crime/detective, Music, Comedy, Arts And Culture ║ 2002 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical starring Catherine Zeta-Jones, Renée Zellweger and Richard Gere. In 1920s Chicago, chorus girl Roxie Hart shoots her lover and winds up in jail, believing her dreams of stardom are over. programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Drama, Crime/detective, Comedy ║ 2002 ║ 12
programme.desc: Comedy drama, based on the true story of conman Frank Abagnale Jr, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Tom Hanks. Shattered by the news that his parents are divorcing, 16-year-old Frank runs away to New York. programme.title: Jericho Ridge
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Nikki Amuka-Bird. Injured police deputy Tabby Temple returns to work after a period of leave to discover that the station has been broken into and weaponry stolen. programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. As the Second World War rages, American fashion model-turned-photographer Elizabeth "Lee" Miller defies the expectations of the era and travels to mainland Europe as a war correspondent for Vogue. Reporting from the frontline, Miller captures indelible images of the conflict, including the horrors found in the Nazi concentration camps at Buchenwald and Dachau Ellen Kuras - Director Kate Winslet - Lee Miller Andy Samberg - Davy Scherman Alexander Skarsgård - Roland Penrose Marion Cotillard - Solange D'Ayen Andrea Riseborough - Audrey Withers Noémie Merlant - Nusch Eluard Josh O'Connor - Young Man / Antony Penrose James Murray - Colonel Spencer Arinzé Kene - Major Jonesy Vincent Colombe - Paul Eluard.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. programme.title: 8 Mile

programme.desc: Comedy based on the cartoon series, starring John Goodman and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring Elizabeth Taylor. programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Gary Sinise and Robin Wright. Forrest Gump wasn't born with a lot of smarts, but he is encouraged by his mother to realise his full potential. programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. When blonde and bubbly Barbie experiences a series of sudden crises, she must leave Barbieland to track down her human owner and make things right. programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: Psychological horror drama starring Justice Smith and Brigette Lundy-Paine. As a child, Owen is isolated and awkward, but he finds a friend in fellow outcast Maddy, who introduces him to her favourite TV show: The Pink Opaque. programme.title: S/Lge Highlights

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: A look back at the 1996 Australian Grand Prix at the Melbourne Grand Prix Circuit. Jacques Villeneuve started on pole, qualifying ahead of Damon Hill and Eddie Irvine.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: Relive the 2003 Australian Grand Prix which was held in Melbourne. A British driver claimed the final victory of his career after a disastrous error from a normally composed racer. It was an afternoon to forget for Michael Schumacher and Ferrari. The German missed out on a podium finish for the first time since 2001, while his constructor didn't have a driver in the top three for the first time since 1999. Juan Pablo Montoya appeared on course to seal Williams' first win of the year, before making an uncharacteristic error with eight laps remaining.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: A chance to relive the 2010 Australian Grand Prix from Melbourne's Albert Park circuit. Jenson Button was looking to take the chequered flag for the second successive year.

programme.title: F1: Australian Grand Prix
programme.desc: At Albert Park Circuit in Melbourne, it's lights out for the Australian Grand Prix. Last season, Max Verstappen was joined by Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso on the podium.
